roleset.name: to morally corrupt
roleset.note: DEBAUCH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'debauch' based on sentences in Webtext 2.5-2. No VerbNet entry. Comparison with 'corrupt.' (from debauch.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: corrupted with what? instrument if separate from arg 0 (unlikely)

example.name: Descriptive, excuse Webtext's French
example.text: Popular titles such as The Nun in her Nightdress and John, The Fucker Debauched *none*, were both bestsellers and intellectually respectable in the 18th-century city.
